title: Clear Inquire Balance
description: Clears inquired balances stored under the state for payment of types giftCards,loyaltyPoints or storeCredits.If no payload is passed all the stored balances are removed.

type.description: The type of payment. eg giftCards, loyaltyPoints or storeCredits

id.description: The id whose balance is to be removed from the type passed. eg. giftCardNumber, loyaltyProgramId, storeCreditNumber.
